content:
## Timeblocks

### v1 (5:47)

```plain text
5:47 - 6:30 | Organize Calendar
6:30 - 7:00 | Clean Room
7:00 - 7:15 | Morning Routine
7:15 - 13:00 | Finish implementing Elastic Stack from ground up
13:00 - 13:30 | Afternoon Routine
13:30 - 19:15 | Continue working on Elastic Stack
19:15 - 22:00 | Get Users for Dialect
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

### v2 (11:45)

Didnâ€™t end up following v1 timeblock

```plain text
5:47 - 6:30   | Organize Calendar
6:30 - 8:30   | Update Linkedin Profile
8:30 - 9:45   | Morning Routine
9:45 - 11:45  | Proper sleep (accidentally woke up too early)
11:45 - 13:00 | Re-implement Elastic Stack from Ground up
13:00 - 13:30 | Afternoon Routine
13:30 - 19:15 | Continue working on Elastic Stack
19:15 - 22:00 | Get Users for Dialect
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

### v3 (16:28)

Decided to take the day off as a maintenance day

```plain text
5:47 - 6:30   | Organize Calendar
6:30 - 8:30   | Update Linkedin Profile
8:30 - 9:45   | Morning Routine
9:45 - 11:45  | Proper sleep (accidentally woke up too early)
11:45 - 13:00 | Dealing with this week's events' logistics
13:00 - 16:15 | Cleaning keyboard
16 - 19:15 | Continue working on Elastic Stack
19:15 - 22:00 | Get Users for Dialect
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```

## Routines

### Morning Routine

```plain text
7:00        | Wake Up
7:00 - 7:15 | Fill out Sleep Log; Brush Teeth; Eat Breakfast
```

### Afternoon Routine

```plain text
13:00 - 13:30 | Walk/Office Hours
```

### Evening Routine

```plain text
22:00 - 22:25 | Check email; Create timeblock for next day
22:25 - 22:30 | Clear desk; Plug in devices
22:30 - 22:45 | Brush teeth; Quick shower
22:45 - 23:15 | Reading
23:15         | Fill out Sleep Log; Bedtime
```

## Generic Timeblock

These entries are intentionally vague (the specifics will be listed in the specific timeblocks above), but the general order of tasks/priority of tasks is outlined in the following generic timeblock:

```plain text
7:00 - 7:15   | Morning Routine
7:15 - 13:00  | Dialect work (specific activities listed in specific timeblock above)
13:00 - 13:30 | Walk/Office Hours
13:30 - 19:15 | Dialect work (specific activities listed in specific timeblock above)
19:15 - 20:40 | Side projects
20:40 - 22:00 | Buffer time (accounts for leisure time)
22:00 - 23:15 | Evening Routine
```
